data.title: 100.7 The Bay
data.meta_description: Learn more about our team, find out where to pick up a prize, learn how you can contact members of our staff, and more.
data.text:
ADDRESS AND PHONE:

Executive Plaza

11350 McCormick Road

Executive Plaza III, Suite 701

Hunt Valley, MD 21031

Office: 410-771-8484 • Fax: 410-771-1616

Studio/Request Line: 410-584-1007

Persons with disabilities needing assistance with the contents of the FCC online public file should contact WZBA by calling the Times-Shamrock’s Human Resources department at 570-348-9191.

OFFICE HOURS:

Monday-Friday, 8:30 am-5:30 pm.

PRIZE PICK-UP:

Call Donna Jean at 410-771-8484 x 540 to schedule an appointment.
